data.title: Paul Stephenson
data.meta_description: Paul Stephenson. Writer: Three Day Millionaire. Paul Stephenson was born and raised in the northern port town of Kingston Upon Hull and worked in shipbuilding before becoming a writer - obtaining literary representation with MBA Literary Agents (Fitzrovia, London). Paul is also co-owner (along with the original Producers of Silent Witness) of Kingston Films and studied an MA in screenwriting for TV & Film at Royal Holloway University of London....
data.text: Paul Stephenson was born and raised in the northern port town of Kingston Upon Hull and worked in shipbuilding before becoming a writer - obtaining literary representation with MBA Literary Agents (Fitzrovia, London). Paul is also co-owner (along with the original Producers of Silent Witness) of Kingston Films and studied an MA in screenwriting for TV & Film at Royal Holloway University of London. Paul has worked on the BBC shadow scheme for 'Casualty' and has also worked with Artists Studio on development of an international co-production crime drama. Paul has had a number of 'shorts' produced and filmed, has various film and TV scripts in development and continues to work alongside a growing circle of TV Producers, Directors and other writers.
